content: Which American rock band released the hit song "Hotel California" in 1976?

The American rock band that released the hit song "Hotel California" in 1976 is the Eagles. The song was included on their album of the same name, which became one of the best-selling albums in history. The Eagles are known for their distinctive harmony vocals and their blend of rock, country, and pop styles. "Hotel California" is considered one of their most iconic songs and is often regarded as one of the greatest rock songs of all time.
